title: GOP MasQ Off, America’s Authoritarian Future 1.26.21
itunes:title: GOP MasQ Off, America’s Authoritarian Future 1.26.21
description:
In episode 798, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Ify Nwadiwe to discuss the articles of impeachment, the insurrections, the Texas GOP, Kyle Rittenhouse, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. World stands to witness greatest rise in inequality since record-keeping began
  2. Trump Is an Authoritarian. So Are Millions of Americans
  3. Behind the Insurrections
  4. The Texas GOP's new slogan echoes a conspiracy group. Its chair says there's no connection.
  5. Bond agreement for Kyle Rittenhouse modified after he was seen at Racine Co. bar
  6. Kyle Rittenhouse's Mom Hoping To Reel In The Murder Groupies With 'Free Kyle' Bikinis
  7. WATCH: Ifdeez - Luxury (feat. Dream Daddy Allstars)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
